ten.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: Snow had been falling steadily for ten days.
I need to be home by ten  (=ten o'clock).
At the time, she was about ten  (=ten years old).
ten.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: a piece of paper money that is worth ten dollars or ten pounds
ten.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: I reached inside my purse and handed him a ten.
